Detailed Description

This class is a helper class for setting up automatic constants while rendering a visual using effect files.

The automatic constants are referenced by using the d3dx effect file semantics.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Moo::EffectVisualContext::EffectVisualContext (  ) 

Constructor.

This is where he common effect constants are all bound to their corresponding semantics.

Moo::EffectVisualContext::~EffectVisualContext (  ) 

Destructor.
